verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's lawyers] [V: argued] [ARGM-LOC: in a confidential January letter to special counsel Robert Mueller] [ARG1: that the President can not illegally obstruct the Russia probe because he , as the top law enforcement officer , has authority over all federal investigations , The New York Times reported Saturd] ...

President Donald Trump 's lawyers argued in a confidential January letter to special counsel Robert Mueller that the President [V: can] not illegally obstruct the Russia probe because he , as the top law enforcement officer , has authority over all federal investigations , The New York Times reported Saturd ...
